thread.title: Enes Kanter celebrated return to Thunder with a gross photo of his stitches
thread.title_full: Enes Kanter celebrated return to Thunder with a gross photo of his stitches

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Enes Kanter celebrated return to Thunder with a gross photo of his stitches
text: Enes Kanter celebrated return to Thunder with a gross photo of his stitches Ouc . Rec Near the end of January, Enes Kanter punched a chair on the bench in frustration during an Oklahoma City Thunder-Dallas Mavericks game. At first it was just reported as wrist injury, but it turned out Kanter actually fractured his forearm. Kanter was to be out six to eight weeks with the fracture, but is returning early to get back with the Thunder after the All-Star break. In celebration of his return, he posted a fairly disgusting picture of his surgery and the healing process. Back with the booyyss!! — Enes Kanter (@Enes_Kanter) February 25, 2017 It’s great that Kanter is back with the Thunder early and that his arm has healed. We could do without the first photo, though. And don’t punch any more chairs. Next Up In NBA
